item.title: [317] How to make you go up or down with a ladder? [317]
item.dc:creator: @k1lguy k1lguy
item.description:
@k1lguy wrote:

i not remember that script but i think it is this…

if (objectID == 8744){
toX = (your X coord);
toY = (your Y coord);
heightLevel += 1;
}

item.title: [317] How to make you go up or down with a ladder? [317]
item.dc:creator: @Pascalrs2 Pascalrs2
item.description:
@Pascalrs2 wrote:

How can i make ladder which i can use for climb up or climb down??
I don’t know what i have to do.
This is wat i have:

if ((objectID == 8744) && (objectX == 2335) && (objectY == 3160) && (heightLevel == 0)) {
toX = 8743;
toY = 2334;
heightLevel += 1;

I tried this too:

if ((objectID == 8744) && (objectX == 2335) && (objectY == 3160) {
toX = 8743;
toY = 2334;
heightLevel += 1;

whats wrongg

Please HELP :rolleyes:
